definition: A sensor bot is an algorithm that extracts raw data from external sources (i.e.: exchanges, Twitter, etc.) and stores it in a dataset that other bots may consume.

paragraphs.text: The sensor bot node holds all definitions required for a sensor bot to function. Definitions are split between the definition of processes and products. A sensor's processes is an algorithm that obtains data from a third pary and produces an output for other bots to consume. Part of that output is the data products the bot creates.
To add a sensor bot, select Add Sensor Bot on the data mine node menu. A sensor bot is created along with the basic structure of nodes required to define it.
Select Configure Bot on the menu to access the configuration.
codeName is the name of the bot as used within the code of the system.
